channel.title: Item Replacer
channel.description:
I saw around the forums one day on an item replacer. For example I could search for item 995 and insert a quantity of 2000 and anyone who has that item with a quantity of 2000 or more it would give me the name. Or i could replace that item with a different item.
Any idea where i can find this or if this is even possible.?

item.title: Item Replacer
item.dc:creator: @akz_magic akz magic
